name: Finer Solution
tag_list: contact, shared-calendars, personal-calendars, documents, marketing, web-forms, crm, workspace, website-hosting, domain-registration
overview:
Finer Solution is the world’s first, pay-as-you-go small business workspace hosted in the cloud.

Finer Solution was created out of a need to grow our business and centralize the way we manage our contacts, scheduling, marketing and online presence. We told a few people about what we were doing to make our small business run smoother and we quickly found that others wanted in. So that’s exactly what we did — we opened the doors to our small business workspace for others.

Finer Solution is a fast growing and constantly evolving service for small business owners that allows you to manage the most important aspects of your business from one convenient workspace. Think of it as your workspace in the cloud.
